channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Custom Post Type List Shortcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Custom Post Type List Shortcode

item.title: CVE-2023-0542|2024-08-02T05:17:49.939Z -- unknown -- custom%20post%20type%20list%20shortcode
item.description: The Custom Post Type List Shortcode WordPress plugin through 1.4.4 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
